reviews.review:
9/10
The story was one of the best I've ever seen in a game, not a single bad point to make about it.
The gameplay was challenging and remained interesting, only occasionally feeling repetative.
the graphics... you can see for yourself.
Also, the game seemed to play at a decent frame rate even without a very high spec machine.

An amazing game that does not absolutely require you to play the first two to understand what's going on. (Though that obviously helps.) If you havn't heard about the ending yet, just know it is the best ending to any game I've ever played, and worth the journey to the conclusion. A must have for those who enjoy single player story driven games.

bad

i mean real bad

at least in call of duty's single player the enemies aren't all damage sponges - but that's the only difference

the plot itself is apologetic towards slave owners, has a "strong female character" that's actually a vending machine and wraps itself up with bullshit "science fiction" (that is used to replace any gravity that the original plot about slavery had) so fluffy it'd put doctor who to shame

i want my money back
Bästa spelat som jag har spelat! :)
The best game ive ever played. Brilliant story, great graphics, fantastic voice acting, great combat what more do you want from a game. I deffinately reccomend this game to anyone.
Fantastic game. Immersive from the very beginning. Hugely story driven. Will leave you thinking for a good while after finishing it.
Thumbs up! Definitely a screenplay masterpiece. I really enjoyed this game.
Bioshock Infinite is one of the best games ever. My personal favourite.
10/10. Наверное, лучший сюжет за последние лет 5.
This game was amazing, Graphics were very nice. Story was great and the concept of the game is nice. Nice that Elizabeth didnt get in the way once and i've seen no glitches in this. 10/10
Um jogo incrivel, com uma historia fantastica e um final surpreendente.
The different visual style and story line is awesome.
This is a great game that builds on the Bioshock legend!  If you love the first Bioshock, then play this one!
Just, Yes.
This may quite possibly be one of the best games i have ever played. I dont really have words for it besides that.
Really fun and I enjoyed the story but once you're done with both the main campaign and  a few of the bonus stuff it gets boring quite quickly.

First off Wow............ That ending was a mind fuck. This game was one of the most beatiful games i have ever played, with some of the best visual effect ive seen in games. Story line was very compelling enjoyed it and got stuck ito it right from the start. Towards the end of the game i got a little confused what was going on because they chucked a whole load at you in the last 20 minutes of gameplay. But overall this was an amazing game and deserves a high praise from us all. Maybe some people say its overrated yeah, some like me would say the ending they didnt like, but overall this is a brilliant game and has some of the best gameplay out there.

8/10
I was so high in the air I coudn't see my vagina, it's not because I'm scared of hieghts it's that the penis went way to up in my bum it just looks like a hole with a plunger in it.

I watched the ending like 3 fuckin times and i still don't get it.

10/10
This actually is a mind boggling game, gameplay wise it is quite enjoyable!

La mejor historia que he jugado.
Muy recomendable que lo jueguen y pongan mucha atención a la trama. Es lo mejor!
Просто незабываемый сюжет и атмосфера....про сюжет просто молчу) мне было очень грустно...Отдельный + к музыке!!!!

Так как я не только не являюсь поклонником шутеров, а даже скорее являюсь противником этого жанра (в шутеры мне играть традиционно скучно), я могу смело заявить, что эта игра рекомендована абсолютно всем, каждому игроку и вот почему: потрясающий сюжет и прекрасно выписанные главные персонажи (Элизабет и Букер Девитт). На мой взгляд этого вполне достаточно, чтобы с игрой ознакомился каждый. Если стрелять по противникам совсем уж в тягость - просто выберете низкий уровень сложности. Хотя лично я проходил на высоком, кроме трех эпизодов, которые оказались мне не по силам, поэтому пришлось выставить "средний" уровень сложности. Помимо сюжета здесь прекрасная графика - очень рекомендуется большой монитор, а еще лучше большой телевизор, динамичный геймплей - нас постоянно держат в напряжении и чрезвычайно скрупулезно переданная атмосфера стимпанка с примесью старой америки, которую мы любили еще в Fallout. Если же прошли эту игру и вам она не понравилась - пожалуйста напишите мне почему. Мне правда хочется это знать.

Добавленно: что касается DLC - их оценить, пожалуй, может лишь тот, кто играл в первую часть игры. Во время прохождения мне было если честно скучно, мне было странно и может даже неприятно видеть Элизабет в ее новом "суровом" облике, мне было непонятно наблюдать за развитием событий в Burial at Sea 2, но ознакомившись с сюжетом первой части (без этого что-то пытаться понять просто бесполезно) я пришел к выводу, что происходящее имеет смысл. Махатме Ганди понравилась бы Элизабет. А вот что не понравилось мне, так это дизайн "сестричек".В первых двух частях они были похожи на детей, а тут черты лица какие-то утрированные, словно разработчики намеренно хотели разграничить сестричек и обычных детей. Но смысл от этого теряется. И это очень грустно.

I highly recommend this game to anybody that has played the original Bioshock. The story is very interesting and complicated with interdimensional travel. It also has solid gunplay with upgrades like Bioshock.
Impresionante 10/10

99.999... out of 100
Best game on earth

Top Spiel!!
Bin und war schon immer ein Fan von der Bioshock- Reihe.
Trotz dem neuen Schauplatz und der Veränderung gegenüber den ersten beiden Titeln (Konstanten und Variablen ^^ ), eines der bessern Spiele in seinem Jahrgang.

Really great game.
Not everyone will agree.
But its pretty good.
Es un juegazo digno de ser jugado.

BioSchock Infinite - игра которая вызвает целый спектр эмоций.
В ней нет ничего лишнего — Геймплей, сценарий, графика, музыка в синхронном звучании создают поистине потрясающую стимпанковскую атмосферу. Попадая в первый раз на  солнечные улицы Колумбии, ты слышишь приятную музыку,  просто ходишь и любуешься местными красотами.Прекрасный мир.Прекрасные персонажи. 
Когда от паращего города в тебе просыпается чувство невесомости ,а от моментов вроде игры на гитаре, улыбка сама появляется на лице, то понимаешь, что мир Infinite совершенно уникален, и одно лишь нахождение в нем становится настоящим праздником.
Хотя бы "просто не познакомится" с этой игрой, будет считаться преступлением.
One of the best singleplayer stories i've ever played! Beautiful world,nice skills... This game just worths your money
Vraiment très bon!!!!
A must play computer game

I actually REALLY enjoyed this game. 

The storyline, obviously, kept me most interested. I was always dying to see what happened next. Graphics were great, and there were parts that were a bit of a challenge for me (especially not being the world's greatest at FPS). 

Bravo! 
I'll DEFINITELY be playing Burial at Sea! :D
M A S T E R P I E C E
One of the best games I've ever played. Not just a good game, it's an experience. A very immersive experience. Really dig the industrial age/steam punk vibe of the game.
10/10. Enviorment, gameplay, story, I could go on. I don't care how you get the money just get it.
booker should have been black

Everything Ive heard about this game says Its AMAZING. Honestly the combat is repetative and the story kept me seriously disintersted, Im struggling to finish the game to see the so called amazing storyline. 5/10

Overall: 10 / 10

Bioshock is one of the few game franchises that have made it through three iterations without loosing their identity. The third installment features an amazing storyline, incredible voice acting and stunning visuals that will keep you immersed from beginning to end. An absolutely fantastic game that I would highly recommended.

At the very start I noticed how sub par the graphics were, and for a game that came out in 2013 it should be alot better.
The water when you are on the boat, come on!
While walking through the city for the first time and seeing little children playing by the street and hearing laughter, but as you look at their faces they are not animated, just regular faces barred of any emotion. Only ones who are not static are the main characters.
I also noticed how the light from the sun would hit impossible places. It makes me think they made the game without testing it.
Turning up the brightness doesn't make the game look any better, people!

The shooting aspect of the game was passable, a few annoying things were the insanely large hit box (mind you, I played on hard) and quite a couple of times when I hit enemies in their head it wasn't registered so I had to hit them again. 
Also, hit marker? Seriously?
The AI in this game is incredibly bad.
I havn't seen stupid enemies like this since Time Splitters 2.  ( Don't get me wrong, TS2 was a great game when it came out)
When you die you are revived not far from the place you died and you get all the ammo you had when you entered the zone AND ALL THE ENEMIES YOU KILLED ARE STILL DEAD. You only lose money, what the hell?

Besides from this you don't have too many options on where to go, or what to do.
At one point can you choose where to go first and at three points you can choose between two options what to do.
As I only chose one and didn't replay it I don't know if anything could have been different, but I doubt that it would be.

There are some optional side quests along the way, but it's really just a matter of finding the hidden item.

I went through the better part of the game without caring about the story or the characters, and when it suddenly became interesting (interesting as in a straight-to-dvd sci-fi movie from early 00s) the game ended.

This game recieved fantastic reviews from all over...
R.I.P. gaming.

An OK game, not at all great. 5/10 

Get it if it's on a sale 75-90% off.
Tout simplement une merveille dans le monde videoludique.

Wonderful, a welcome respite from Rapture with stunning visuals and good old fun gameplay. 
I would have liked a bit more of a challenge, but sometimes this is enough for good plain fun.

Visually stunning, entertaining and smooth gameplay add up to make one of my favourite games of 2013. With a deep story, some great weapons and characters that really show some personality, this is a game definely worth playing for those who enjoy shooters, storylines and fun.
You can eat a "potato" out of a toilet

To start off, I have way too many memories of this game but I can not even begin to fathom how amazing this game is. It never fails to give me a sense of awe and joy each and every time I play.

This game is truly beautiful (To say in the least). Every particular aspect is appreciated.

Immerse your self in the flying city of "Columbia" playing as the protagonist by the name of "Booker Dewitt" in search of a girl by the name of "Elizabeth" (Whom will furthermore take part as your sidekick).

Infinite holds a very intricate sense of character apparel, environment detail, picturesque scenery, graphic detail, music and reminds me of a "Steam punk" like environment.

Every time I launch myself into this game, I get an over bearing, heart warming sensation and blast of nostalgia. 
This game and it's brilliance simply can not be awarded with in words, for this piece of art can only be truly recognized and appreciated by the experience of the beholder.
more action based than it's predecessors, more streamlined as well. still stands as an excellent contribution to the bioshock universe. well worth the time.

I find this game one of the best story driven FPS i ever played, the mysterious plot and characters draw you in and are the highlight of the game. The world of Columbia and every place you visit looks awesome and breathtaking. All finished with the entertaining combat system that create an amazing experience from beginning to end. I can't recommend this game enought. As a gamer this is a "must played!"
Just awesome!  Love the new setting in the early 1900's. The game play is exciting and dynamic. The new setting is epic.

Très bon jeu que je conseille fortement dans la ligné des 2 premiers.
Très beau, univers très étrange et angoissant.
Visually stunning, with a rollercoaster story that grips even harder if you played the previous Bioshock games. The combat is a tried and tested formula but new powers keep it interesting.

Filled to burst with plot. Best game I've played all year. 10/10. Buy this game. If you could only pick one game to be stuck with forever, it should be this one. BUY THIS GAME. BUY IT. NOW. DO IT. BUY IT.

Absolutely beautiful! This game looks great, and so far has a interesting, fast paced storyline. The controls for me have been smooth, and I sometimes use my xbox controller instead of the mouse/keyboard combo. Since it looks so great though, its one of the games I use to show people that pc's are superior to consoles (in my opinion).

Excellent FPS. The story is by far the best part of the game. It is been a long time since I last played a game with a rich story and charismatic characters -> Elizabeth :)
The story not only has a great ending, it also criticizes utopian societies - and the revolutionaries that want a "better world" by destroying them.
Definitely a must-buy for every gamer that enjoy FPS.
This game is fun and just a great story all together. Really all you have to say about it.
Um dos melhores jogos *-*

Greetings, comrades! I usually go "full-bore" on my reviews, but I simply can't do it for this game. It has effected me so deeply, and felt so real that anything I'd say couldn't do it justice, so I'm gonna sum this up in four words:


Game. Of. The. Millennia!!!!!!!!!!!!!


Thanks for reading and have an awesome day!


(Disclaimer: this is a personal opinion.)

Edit: It has been almost 3 years since my original review of this game, and I've matured a lot since then. While I wish that I would have gone into more detail about the gameplay/story/atmosphere, I do not regret this review. It accurately captures the feelings that were coursing through my viens at the time, and still to this day actually. The emotional impact created by this game is something that I'll never forget, and this is unequivocally the best game I've ever played (and I've played a lot, trust me). This game was amazing, is still amazing, and will always be amazing! So would you kindly bring us the girl and wipe away the debt?

Will the Circle be unbroken,
By and by, by and by,
Is a better home awaiting,
In the sky, in the sky?

Игра прекрасная ,с офигенным миром с классными способностями и крутым сюжетом ,если у вас есть 18 баксов тогда покупайте ее немедленно ибо мне кажется она должна стоить еще дороже .Я особенно жду дополнения Burial at sea - Episode 2 жаль оно будет последним(

Bioshock Infinite is one of the most amazing games I've ever played. It has gorgeous graphic, an amazing and creative storyline, and awesome guns and enemies. I also find Elizabeth really helpful in the game, and I like how I don't have to help her throughout the game. The only problem with this game is it's laggy on the Mac, even at the lowest settings. Otherwise, it's perfect.
10/10

After the "somewhat" letdown of Bioshock 2, Infinite sets the path straight once again for the franchise. 

Expect a good story with some twists, the same solid combat mechanics as before (plasmids included) and visually stunning levels. 

But the biggest addition is the best-to-date designed companion NPC (Elizabeth). Her model-animation, voice and personality are a true landmark in gaming.

On the downside, it's a bit short and lacks replayability, but the great overall quality makes up for it.

First--this game is not like the other bioshock games.  Second--any game that starts to mess with time really needs to take a leason from timeshift or any other time changing games that we have seen.  This game was amazing--great story, graphics, a loveable character.  But--the ending made it terrible.  If you catch it on sale and want to finish the series, sure.  After all, you even make it back to rapture.  Otherwise, avoid.

I absolutely love this game. The graphics are incredible. The story and the twists are as good as they come in gaming. The gameplay is top notch. Booker and Elizabeth are some of the most complex and entertaining characters in gaming that I have played as in a very long time. You owe it to yourself if you are an adventure gamer to give this a try. You'll Love it!

素晴らしく綺麗です。歩いているだけで楽しい。
ストーリーは複雑ですが衝撃的で楽しめました。
ぜひBioShock1をプレイした後にやって欲しいゲームです。

This is the most overrated game that I know of. You walk around, from what is basically arena to arena, shooting bullet spongey enemies. The game only allows you to carry two guns at once, meaning combat is very boring, and spend most of your looking around for ammo. The vigors are very boring, mostly just push/pull enemies, or attack/ set mines. The story is passable, but it really bashes you over the head with 'racism is bad', and is made convoluted with to much fighting in an effort to try and make the game longer. The graphics are quite nice, and it's a good pc port, but this does not make up for the absolutly terrible combat.

alter falter! holy moly! Eins der besten Spiele die ich je gespielt hab. 
Ich habe 4 Stunden am Stück gespielt, die Story packt einen brutal und man kann sich richtig in DeWitt reinversetzen...
der kerrle is brutal 
ach und greetings an die boys von bioshock, well done hombres
Great game with amazing story line graphics and game play. A game anyone who enjoys a first person shooter can enjoy

Nonostante il cambio radicale di ambientazione, BioShock Infinite ha mantenuto intatto lo spirito della serie e ha dimostrato di essere un FPS atipico dall’indubbio spessore tanto quanto il suo capostipite, superandolo sotto certi aspetti.
Diversamente da Rapture, che esibiva fin da subito una città degradata dalla follia dei suoi abitanti, Columbia si presenta all'apparenza come l’emblema del paradiso in Terra, una città maestosa, luminosa e viva, e svela a dosi sempre più crescenti i suoi lati oscuri e il suo essere sfaccettato e irrazionale, ponendo il giocatore davanti a svariate ed importanti tematiche dalla non facile trattazione. Tutto ciò, crea un azzeccato connubio tra trama ed atmosfera, che diventano un tutt’uno in un viaggio nel profondo di Columbia, alla scoperta di cosa è realmente e da cosa deriva, in un turbinio di situazioni che creeranno un panorama non sempre chiaro, che troverà spiegazione solo sul finale, spiazzando il giocatore con la sua bellezza. 

Voto personale: 9

The original has a great (if occasionally confusing) story line. Combat is a bit crappy but for the most part bearable. The expansions, however, are a different matter - combat and little else; I don't recommend the expansion packs. Why? Combat is just not tactical. For the most part you have to run, react fast and shoot a few times, then run again. Small groups of men aren't too bad (except when snipers kill you instantly while you're going fast on a skyline), patriots are a bit annoying but can be dealt with, but the handyman is just rediculously difficult (mostly just in your face or throwing something at you before you have time to move due to slightly awkward movement in the game).
never got it 2 launch on xp even tho reqiaments sed xp was. wen i looket again it changed 2 vista . or windows7 . so i am stuk whith a game that i cant launch sad .
Muito bom mesmo, valeu cada centavo só que eu só consegui enxergar direito com a claridade no máximo
this is an absolutely fantastic game 10/10
Отличная игра воистену
Excellent jeu
epic.
Jogo super envolvente e final mais que surpreendente, simplesmente o melhor jogo que eu já joguei na minha vida vale muito a pena comprar.

This game was amazing. I loved the story line and the atmospheric feel. THe character development and relationship of Booker and Elisabeth makes this game a suspensful shooter i couldnt let go of until i finished.
Though staged in a completely different environment, and a lot of the main themes of the original are gone, this is most definetly a Bioshock game.

La verdad, un gran juego, al igual qu elo son el bioshock 1 y el 2. La historia sigue siendo igual de interesante. y, aunque sea un poco corto ( en caso de que te vicies y te lo pases en 1 dia xD) está muy currado. Además muy buenos gráficos. 

Si lo encunetran en oferta, comprenlo. Nada más que decir :D

All in all a fantastic game with great graphics, beautiful environments and great high-altitude combat.
The only thing from keeping this game from getting a higher score is that it lacks the replay value due to the removal of the moral choices and the linear gameplay.
7/10

[i]"The mind of the subject will desperately struggle to create memories where none exist…"
R. Lutece, Barriers to Trans-Dimensional Travel, 1889[/i] 

Эта игра - ещё одна из тех, что подтверждают - игры могут быть произведениями искусства. Рекомендую поиграть всем, независимо от того, играете ли вы в шутеры. Да что там - даже независимо от того, играете ли вы вообще в игры. Это не просто игра. Это произведение искусства, которое заставляет задуматься.

События игры являются альтернативной историей, не связаны с событиями первых двух частей серии BioShock, но происходят в той же вселенной. По сюжету, в 1900 году в США, находящейся на пике технологического развития, построили огромный летающий город Колумбия, который должен был стать гордостью американской нации и чудом среди творений человека. Однако, как сказал ДеВитт...

    Just cause a city fly doesn't mean it ain't got its fair share of fools.

Поэтому через некоторое время город начал вести свою, крайне экстремистскую политику, направленную против всех «не американцев», чем вызвал недовольство «земного» правительства. Президент США предъявил ультиматум, на что Колумбия под руководством некого Пророка... набрала высоту и исчезла из поля зрения высоко в облаках. И начали её жители жить изолированно в своего рода ковчеге, отделившись от содома внизу. Ибо:

    What is Columbia if not another arc, for another time?

Собственно, протагонист игры - бывший сотрудник «Детективного агентства Пинкертона» Букер ДеВитт. Человек сложный, потрепанный жизнью, достаточно циничный, но не потерявший в душе надежду на лучшее. Нравятся мне глубокие и хорошо прописанные герои. За ДеВитта приятно играть. Да-да. За бывшего пьяницу и игрока, не гнушающегося обыскивать трупы. Думающего, что он умеет только убивать (а еще есть всё, что лежит в ящичках стола и даже мусорках и давно стухло бы в реальности). Но его боль не наиграна, характер прописан так, как иногда и в книгах не прорабатывают - и хочется, чтобы у него был кусочек счастья. Вот так просто. Чтобы он не ждал везде подвоха. Чтобы не приходилось первым выхватывать пистолет.

    One thing I've learned - if you don't draw first, you don't get to draw at all.

В 1912 году к нему обращается довольно странный клиент, знающий местоположение Колумбии, и под предлогом списания его долгов просит освободить заточенную в башне на протяжении всей её сознательной жизни девушку по имени Элизабет, обладающую сверхъестественными способностями. Вот такая завязка. И тут же игра слов (вообще говоря, даже двойная, но это понимаешь позже). Bring us the Girl and wipe away the debt». И тебе простится долг? В общем-то, да. Вот только у слова debt есть еще одно значение, так сказать, библейское – «грех». И оно тут еще как к месту.

А. Да. А еще запомните - начинается всё всегда с маяка. И города. И человека.

    Мы плаваем в разных морях, но выходим на тот же берег.

Полный текст рецензии (без спойлеров, много текста и скриншотов): http://core-rpg.ru/forum/113-872-63062-16-1377775200
Never have I played a game where the accompanying AI character is so awesome as this one! 10/10 would play again!

Wow... this game is amazing. The way the present the story and atmosphere... simply amazing. It feels so much more tense than the first two. I have loved each game in this series, but this one just seems to draw you in more. While it's unfortunate that the difficulty is much less than the others, it's also a boon as well- because without feeling you have to scrounge every last resource and each fight not being reloaded 20 times over, you really get to just lose yourself in the story. And the synergy between the protagonist and Elizabeth? It's just, wow. I don't even have the words.

If you are into RPGs and love stories, definitely pick this game up. The action is no slouch either, as the battles feel really fun and reward ingenuity. However, if all you are looking for is action, there may be better games out there for you. *cough* Titanfall *cough* (If you can't tell, i'm really looking forward to titanfall lol)
This game is amazing. Twist ending fucks your mind.

Even thought it's hard to compete with games such as Bioshock and Bioshock 2, this game is fantastic. The beautiful scenery that surrounds you helps bring to life this amazing game. Action scenes and wonderful character interactions make this game a must have. 10/10
great
jaw dropping ending

This is probably going to be one of the most out-there games you will ever play. The story is one of the best and most mind-blowing I have experienced. The FPS element mixed with classic weapons and vigors, Elizabeth assisting, and skyrailing makes combat experience just wonderful. 

My only complaint is that you do not keep your leveled-up weapons and vigors when you start a new game, but that's exceptable seeing as how everything else in this game is just top-notch.

" Il y a des jeux où en, peu de temps, on comprend que l'on a en face de soi un jeu différent. Un je ne sais quoi qui flotte dans l'air et qui promet une expérience hors des sentiers battus. Bioshock Infinite fait partie de ces jeux. "

Nos premiers pas à Columbia nous laissent profiter de la richesse de l'environnement. L'univers est riche, détaillé et on a qu'une envie, flâner dans les rues de cette cité volante. Mais pas le temps de rêvasser, il faut trouver la mystérieuse Elizabeth. Si à la base, la ramener servira à effacer les dettes de Booker De Witt, il s'avèrera rapidement que la jeune fille a plus d'importance qu'escompté. Fuir Columbia avec la demoiselle sera alors l'occasion de multiplier les scènes épiques où la contemplation de l'environnement laisse place aux combats nerveux. Notre arsenal est relativement restreint mais le plus amusant reste de jouer avec les Toniques, sortes de pouvoirs permettant de se sortir de situations délicates. 
Au final, le seul point négatif du jeu est sa fin. Non pas qu'elle soit mauvaise, mais elle nous laisse un goût amer dans la bouche, celui d'avoir raté quelque chose. Car, ne jouissant pas d'une durée de vie énrome, la fin va un peu vite mais permet l'interrogation, ce qui nous laisse méditer sur les évenements vécus durant notre épopée. Une expérience à faire !
One of the best game I played! Good graphics, good story line, addictive and theme well exploited. 10/10
A game everyone should play, truely amazing!
Me gusto el inicio del juego y el desenlace que tiene la trama, aun o lo termino pero te pega el  juego
85/100 na minha opinião, um dos melhores FPS que já joguei. O único problema é a duração, muito curto.

Um...MIND BLOWN!!!!

When I am on Steam, I put all of the games I am still playing in my favorites list so it is more organized. Then, when I'm finished with that game, I remove it from my favorites bar and then uninstall it so I have more space for other games. The fact that I have finished Bioshock Infinite and dont even play it any more (unless there is DLC) and it is still sitting in my favorites list, should say something.

This game has become one of my favorite of all time! The story is the main reason to play this game. Even though this game runs well at the highest graphics, looks AMAZING, and the gameplay (although not comparable to any of the other elemnts) still a blast, the story alone takes the freaking cake sir. Afte I was finished with this game, I sat in my chair for about 5 minutes trying to figure out what just happened. I cannot stress enough about how you NEED TO PLAY THIS GAME. I promise, you will be blown away at the end.

Like.....holy crap. I beat this game in one sitting due to its amazing plot, and stunning graphics. I mean you start out in a rocket ship, like who doesnt love that. The city of colombia is beautiful highlighted by the giant statue and the interlocking grid of skyrails. Throughout the game you are accompanied by Elizabeth who assists you in combat by tossing you weapons or ammo. The many features of combat combined with the immense plot of the false shepard makes this game a 9/10 should play.
This game is like winning the lottery except once it's over you're still poor.
When I got this game, I couldn't stop playing it. I got a very instant-nostalgia vibe from it - like when you play HL2 for the first time. No joke - must play.
Un chef d'oeuvre !!!
Великолепное сочетание прекрасной нетривиальной истории и современного шутера от первого лица. Последний раз испытывал такие эмоции при прохождении Half-Life 2. Шедевр.
Awesome story and amazing graphics! :D

Есть шедевры кинематографа, шедевры живописи и литературы, а Bioshock Infinite по праву может называться шедевром игровой индустрии. Главный герой попадает в фантастический небесный город Колумбия, где ему даётся достаточно тривиальное задание найти девушку. Но когда я в первый раз увидел этот город, я уже влюбился в Bioshock, а с развитием сюжета игра все глубже западала мне в душу. Единственный минус, это то что все хорошее когда-нибудь заканчивается и пройдя игру я долго ходил под «впечатлением». Но Bioshock Infinite одна из тех игр, которые можно проходить все снова и снова.
